experience.title: Software Engineer, Big Data,Data Infrastructure, XYZ

experience.description:
Building big-data pipeline infrastructure for big-chain restaurants for generating guest analytics using Hadoop, Hive, HBase, Sqoop, Java programming, SQL and shell scripting. This data pipeline delivers user-segmentation reports, menu-item-segmentation reports and business reports for these restaurants using their POS (Point Of Sale) system data as input. 
As Software Engineer, I was involved in the end-to-end design and development of this data pipeline.
experience.title: Junior Software Engineer, Big Data,Data Infrastructure, ABC

summary:
I am a senior level developer with several years experience in the field of Java development with expertise in Big Data, Cloud computing Hadoop technologies like map-reduce, Pig, Hive, and HDFS and also realtime technologies like Storm. I also have experience in web development. I have done my MS in ABCD and XYZ, both highly reputed colleges and both the degrees in Computer science. 

Specialties: Expertise in Java programming, Cloud computing technologies like Hadoop technologies like map-reduce, Hive, Pig and HDFS, . I also have considerable experience in C++ developement on Linux and J2EE based application development
